props.title: HOW DO WE DIFFER FROM EXISTING SYSTEMS

rows.headline: Empowering Local Governance with Data
rows.text: Most rural water systems depend on manual records and delayed reporting. Our platform brings transparency and efficiency by giving Gram Panchayats a real-time digital dashboard for monitoring pipelines, pumps, and water quality.

rows.headline: Technology Made Simple
rows.text: We design tools that any GP staff or village functionary can use — even without technical training — ensuring faster response, reduced downtime, and better water services.

rows.headline: Building Ownership, Not Dependence
rows.text: Our solution puts local communities in control — from daily O&M tracking to predictive alerts.

rows.headline: Transparency for Every Drop
rows.text: Each test, complaint, and maintenance action is digitally recorded — so every household knows the water they receive is safe and well managed.
